title: Cassiopeia merch
body: Hey, I noticed that Cassiopeia has no merch. What's the deal? Not even a t-shirt or a hoodie? Come on rito. Do your thing and get us some quality merch for cass. And maybe even give rigor some love while your at it.

replies.body: She doesnt even get skins, what makes you think they would make merch from her?
i have the cass mystery pin. so theres soemthing
They're clearly discriminating against lamias which is pretty disgusting tbh.
